This project was built to demonstrate real-time text manipulation and audio synchronization using Python. It uses the `pygame` library to handle audio and standard output flushing for a smooth "typing" effect.

## ğŸ’¡ How it Works
The script calculates the timing for each line of the lyrics and uses a typewriter effect to display them as the music plays.
